SENT.plain: Over a 30 month-period (1.7.85-7.1.88) 44 totally implantable catheter-systems were used in 41 patients under oncological treatment
Indication was in 40 cases pending, or already started chemotherapy; in one case the indication were multiple transfusions because of aplastic anemia
We used three similar systems of different manufacturers
Our experiences with implantation and care of these systems as well as minor complications are demonstrated
